{{Translation|'''Raging Thunder'''|魔導昇雷撃|Reijingu Sandā|furigana=ライジングサンダー}} is a sword technique utilised by [[Temujin]] by drawing energy from the [[Stone of Gelel]].

== Overview ==
By focusing gelel energy onto his [[Knight Sword|sword]] and after dealing a blow with it, Temujin can create a powerful [[Gelel]] barrier before him. This technique was used in an attempt to negate [[Naruto]]'s [[Rasengan]]. The two attacks resulted in a massive explosion that destroyed the mountain peak that Naruto and Temujin were fighting on.

== Trivia ==
* Although the Japanese subtitle of this technique is written in kanji, it is pronounced in English, {{Translation|"Raging Thunder"|ライジングサンダー|Reijingu Sandā}}. The Japanese pronunciation of the kanji would be ''Madō Shōraigeki'', which would literally translate to "Magic Rising Lightning Strike".
